title: how to remove staingate/ macbook retina anti-reflective coating?
message: basically the title, what can i use to fix this?. like using alcohol or listerine it takes ages and there are cases where a part doesnt come off!. qwhat can reliabily take it off?

title: how to remove staingate/ macbook retina anti-reflective coating?
message: Still going to need elbow grease. Theres no product that just wipes the coating off.

title: how to remove staingate/ macbook retina anti-reflective coating?
message: well, we will see about that. i bought some stuff, that supposedly does just that!. ill let you know if it works, or if i got scammed haha

title: how to remove staingate/ macbook retina anti-reflective coating?
message: I use one of those headlight polishing pads you put on a drill with some metal polish seems to be the fastest way, Will have to use a quality polish afterwards to reduce swirl marks. Only if the coating is really hard to get off i will use that method otherwise sometimes it just nearly falls off with baby wipes and a bit of rubbing.
